name: Neon Multiverse
description:
NEON MULTIVERSE is a first person jump and run / gravity puzzler. 

In NEON MULTIVERSE you have the power of the multiverse at your fingertips (quite literally). Use your skills to
transport yourself through portals to the different parallel universes and utilize them to overcome obstacles and
master puzzles. You will see that the parallel universes are quite similar to your home universe - in fact,
they only differ in one key physical aspect from each other.
These little differences will aid you through the game. However, the portal that transports you into the different
universes is unstable and can't keep you in there for too long - so hurry! The objective of every level simply is to find the exit (the orange floor tile).

Created during the Game Jam Event at the Technische Universitaet Darmstadt - Multimedia Communications Lab (KOM)

The following assets were not created by us but have been used to save us some time:

http://opengameart.org/content/keyboard-keys
by the author "TRBRY" with the CC-BY 3.0 license (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/)
and modified to show different keys of our controls
